title: Hand-Drawn Looking Font
content:
Hi Folks!

Can anyone idea this please?:

Thanks for helping!

author: malbright

comments.content:
hmmm ... Handwritten possibility. Those /S look dissimilar (esp in ESSIE). The /E aren't exact according to mine eyes ... Not sure about the arm on the /A either ... hmmm.

Spiece Graphics font looks as close as possible.

DPape—Yep, I think you're right.

Thanks so much to the both of you for helping!
